channel.title: Samurai on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Samurai on Game6r

item.title: Game Samurai 3d
item.description: Samurai Red Ranger continues his fight against evil. A real warrior is not afraid of any obstacles, no one and nothing is able to stop him. The goal he pursues is to catch and punish the bad guys. Help him complete the mission to clean up the city from criminals. During the battles, the hero will demonstrate good parkour skills.
